name: Tomb of the mutilated
description:
Tomb of the mutilated - horror adventure. At this moment game looks like as long cutscene with one boss fight. Also some graphics elements aren't completed yet. Please forgive me for that and some bugs if you find it.

Since game isn't completed yet i didn't make a final credits. So here i list persons that help me even if they didn't know it.

Controls:

Hold z - run;

X - close inventory, skip dialogue

C - open inventory, use items, open dialogue;

Enter - go to menu;

(Also if you have a gamepad you can test controls on it)

Special thanks :

HeartBeast - more than 90 % movement scripts.

FriendlyCosmonaut - text box.

(If you are going to make rpg using game maker studio and you are novice in code you can find a lot useful information on them youtube channels).

Cyerünix (the gamejolt user) - tech support.

Eky - inventory script.

If you like this game and you as like me want to i make it faster than 2-3 years you can support me (you can really help me now):

PayPal to the address golem3000x@gmail.com

Patreon https://www.patreon.com/user?u=31801941&fan_landing=true

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you all.
